  • java.lang.Object

    com.qualcomm.hardware.ReadWriteRunnable.Callback, HardwareDevice, I2cController, LegacyModule

extends ModernRoboticsUsbDevice
implements LegacyModule

      • registerForI2cPortReadyCallback

        public void registerForI2cPortReadyCallback(I2cController.I2cPortReadyCallback callback,
                                            int port)
        Register to be notified when a given port is ready. The callback method will be called after the latest data has been read from the Legacy Module. Only one callback can be registered for a given port. Last to register wins.
        Specified by:
        registerForI2cPortReadyCallback in interface I2cController
        Parameters:
        callback - register a callback
        port - port to be monitored

      • deregisterForPortReadyCallback

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • getI2cReadCacheLock

        public java.util.concurrent.locks.Lock getI2cReadCacheLock(int physicalPort)
        Description copied from interface: I2cController
        Get access to the read cache lock.

        This is needed if you are accessing the read cache directly. The read cache lock needs to be acquired before attempting to interact with the read cache

        Specified by:
        getI2cReadCacheLock in interface I2cController
        Parameters:
        physicalPort - physical port number on the device
        Returns:
        lock

      • getI2cWriteCacheLock

        public java.util.concurrent.locks.Lock getI2cWriteCacheLock(int physicalPort)
        Description copied from interface: I2cController
        Get access to the write cache lock.

        This is needed if you ace accessing the write cache directly. The write cache lock needs to be acquired before attempting to interact with the write cache

        Specified by:
        getI2cWriteCacheLock in interface I2cController
        Parameters:
        physicalPort - physical port number on the device
        Returns:
        lock
